name: Conex Stainless Steel Fittings India
tag_list: stainless-steel-fittings, pipe-fittings, hose-nipples, hose-barbs, elbows-fittings, tee-union, compression-fittings, pressed-parts, sheet-metal-components, stainless-steel-springs
overview:
Welcome to Conex Stainless Steel Fittings. We are one of the pioneer manufacturers and suppliers of all kinds of Stainless Steel fittings , Stainless Steel hose barbs, Pipe fittings Stainless Steel Cmpression fittings , Stainless Steel CNC turned parts, Pressed SS components form Stainless Steel 304 (A2) and 316 (A4) type.

We have various CNC turning machines, pressing and deep drawing facilities and can offer high quality Stainless Steel parts and components. We are an ISO 9001:2000 company with customers all over the world including highly quality conscious countries like Sweden, Canada, France, Germany, Australia, UK and USA. We have been manufacturing and supplying Stainless Steel hose barbs hose barbed connectors Stainless Steel springs investment castings and threaded hose nipples and fittings to OEMs and distributors since last 25 years.
